summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3261 for the improvement of 8th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 60th Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40447, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
